welcome-card.title: Welcome to your dashboard
welcome-card.content: Welcome, Issuer! Here, you'll find tools and resources that enable you to establish trust in the digital creative space. As a trust service provider, you can approve connection requests from creators and issue verifiable creator credentials, ensuring authenticity and credibility in the creative domain.

verify-domain.title: Verify domain
verify-domain.content: Establish your authority by verifying control over your domain. This process ensures a secure and trusted environment for both issuers and creators.

did-web.title: Set-up did:web
did-web.content: By setting up did:web, you're enhancing the security and reliability of the credentials you issue

qcert.title: Verify QCert for eSeal
qcert.content: Verifying your QCert for eSeal adds an extra layer of trust, indicating that the credentials come from a verified and legitimate source.
